scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Credit Scoring Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct the internal workings of a customer credit scoring model by feeding it carefully crafted inputs and observing the outputs.  The goal is to infer sensitive customer data (e.g., income, debt levels) from the model's predictions, violating customer privacy and potentially enabling fraud.
initial_goal: Develop a system to predict customer creditworthiness based on anonymized input features.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking:  A credit scoring model used to determine eligibility for personal loans and credit cards.
